name.description: This is the name of the engagement event

isIntentional.description: This indicates whether it is an intentional action by the user

scenario.description: This is the name of the scenario

location.description: This is the location from where the event took place

usageType.description: This is what tells if it were a click, tap or a keyboard event

currentPage.description: Page where the event took place

siteId.description: The Id of the relevant SharePoint site

webId.description: The Id of the relevant SharePoint web

listId.description: The Id of the relevant SharePoint list

groupId.description: The Id of the relevant SharePoint group

docId.description: The Id of the relevant SharePoint document

webTemplateId.description: The Template Id of the relevant SharePoint web

listTemplateId.description: The Template Id of the relevant SharePoint list

extraData.description: This is the random extra data for the engagement event
